package.name: linux-amd64
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/config-3.16-amd64-lesslinux-20140815-1425 .config sed -i 's/lesslinux-000/lesslinux-amd64-000/g' .config echo 'CONFIG_ACPI_PROCFS_POWER=y' >> .config cd .. mv linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin:$PATH yes '' | make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- oldconfig if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin/amd64-linux-uclibc-gcc' pump make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin/amd64-linux-uclibc-gcc' bzImage else make -j 4 ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- make -j 4 ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- bzImage fi
